blogPost.excerpt: Showcase your BEST content with a simple, beautiful SleekBio link for your social media profiles. Link your products, embed videos and podcasts, promote your social channels, and more. Plus, measure results with detailed analytics and a Facebook Pixel.

localize.description: 用一个简单、漂亮的SleekBio链接为您的社交媒体资料展示您最好的内容。链接您的产品，嵌入视频和播客，推广您的社交渠道，等等。此外，通过详细的分析和Facebook Pixel来衡量结果。

previous.title: The US housing boom continues with prices hitting all-time highs again, up 11.2% over the past year. This is the highest YoY increase since 2006. https://t.co/JVLdMSaCn2

localize.full_text: 美国房市热潮仍在继续，房价再创历史新高，过去一年上涨11.2%。这是自2006年以来最高的同比增幅。https://t.co/JVLdMSaCn2。
美國房市熱潮仍在繼續，房價再創歷史新高，過去一年上漲11.2%。這是自2006年以來最高的同比增幅。https://t.co/JVLdMSaCn2。
